title: Bug 49250alias getCause for getWrappedThrowable in SoftException
description: Bug 49250alias getCause for getWrappedThrowable in SoftException whenSoftException is itself wrapped as a RemoteException.Since getCause()replicates getWrappedThrowable(), we could deprecate that, but we must continueto support it to maintain upwards binary compatibility in the runtime classes.
EB: SoftException should implement getCause():public Throwable getCause() {return inner;}(As pointed out by Ramnivas, misc mail messages, code comments...)Using getCause() means the chain should print as expected in 1.4+, esp.
